website_summaries.verdict: Great for fine lines and uneven skin tone, but may not do much for deep wrinkles.
pros: Soothing serum that won't irritate your skin, unlike most retinols
cons: Not as effective on deep wrinkles

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin...in a great way!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my skin. Wrinkles were starting to settle in. This has decreased them significantly. Ideally, I would suppose you should use it twice/day. Unfortunately, I can't meet that expectation and it still makes a difference. I also use this on my neck and chest.
customer_reviews.author: KLO29

customer_reviews.title: I have been using a regimen from a dermatologist online ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a regimen from a dermatologist online company. I had noticed it was ok, my skin was hydrated but not a lot of changes as far as lines, color or smoothness. Since I added this serum to my regimen, there has been a huge difference. My skin is smoother, softer, and fewer dark spots. My daughter said it was "soft as a baby's bottom". I will definitely keep using this product, along with other products that hydrate, or sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenah

customer_reviews.title: You will be pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: A mild but very effective skin corrector. This formula is unscented and soothes the skin, whereas many retinol formulations can cause flakiness. Retinol is one of the few topical things ever actually proven to make skin look better. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Temptor

customer_reviews.title: Don't Throw This In The Bottom Drawer!
customer_reviews.text: Don't throw this in the bottom drawer with all of those other discarded products you've tried. Cosmedica Retinol Serum really tightens this senior's skin. It goes on smoothly and invisibly for night time use and performs its magic while you sleep. It just couldn't be easier to care for your skin. Love it, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzywinks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! Will keep using!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about two weeks now and I love it. I have sensitive skin and it's not caused excessive drying using one time per day. There's already been some great observational changes, such as reduced blackheads and wrinkles. I plan on buying some other products - very pleased with the service, packaging, and scent of the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for nearly a week and am very pleased with the improvement of the texture of my skin. My face is much softer and supple. So far so good....!
customer_reviews.author: S K Biberstine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this products after reading several reviews. I have hyperpigmentation and my skin looked dull. After 2 days I saw a difference in my skin. I noticed not only was my skin smooth and soft, but I noticed that it was brighter. I have been using this product every night since I received it. My skin continues to get better and better. The dark spots on my face are fading. I also noticed that my pores look smaller. I love this product! It does not irritate my skin . If you are on the fence about this product I urge you to try it.
customer_reviews.author: CANDY

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Wrinkles. Reduces Dark Spots.
customer_reviews.text: Reduced Wrinkles. Reduces Dark Spots. Put a couple pumps on before bed, avoiding your eyes and lips. It is important that you wear SPF during the day when you are using this as your skin will be more sensitive to sunlight. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.A.

customer_reviews.title: the product itself I'm very happy with. Clear serum I apply after showers
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the pump being a little unpredictable, the product itself I'm very happy with. Clear serum I apply after showers, not sticky and absorbs in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Essential anti-aging product! Great for acne too!
customer_reviews.text: I like this retinol serum. It feels good on my face and it is unscripted. I have been using retinol for about a year and have noticed that I do not get pimples anymore. I have also noticed a decrease in my fine lines around my eyes. I think retinol is an essential anti-aging product to use, and I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product 2xs a day for over 2 years and it is wonderful. The deep lines around my lips are almost gone. Helps around eyes, forehead and esp. my neck. I’m 73 And get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: 6639KCE

customer_reviews.title: I use this alternating with the vitamin c serum! ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this alternating with the vitamin c serum! I noticed a difference after a few uses and my friends do too, never going without this again.
customer_reviews.author: JCarter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could get another bottle. This stuff is amazon and feels great. Works wonders too. Lost job so can’t afford another one but wishes
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I have sensitive skin and It really works well. No red blotches or anything like that.Hope this helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Olcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Please add this to your routine you will not regret
customer_reviews.text: Okay so, adding this to my face care routine was the best thing I've ever done! If your on the fence like I was about spending so much for a shot in the dark trust me please, this is needed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you're in search of retinol serum this is awesome stuff, my wife highly recommends!
customer_reviews.author: D Miller

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it - aging has it consequences and wrinkles are a part of that. That being said, there are ways to help minimize the wrinkles. For me, this is one such product. Even my niece, without my even asking, noticed an improvement in my skin. No, I do not look 20 again but it has certainly helped. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Works great for fine lines!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month and I can really see a difference in my fine lines. I use around 2-3 pumps in the morning putting it on my face and neck. Be sure to follow safety instructions and wear sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Easier, less expensive, lasts longer than something premixed ...
customer_reviews.text: Easier, less expensive, lasts longer than something premixed with a bunch of other things. I use this in conjunction with Vit C serum, Hyaluronic Acid, and finally, a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You can’t forget to use sunscreen if you are going to use this. Pretty good product- price

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work but it's great lubrication
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work it's not a fountain of youth it's just moisturizer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This Retinol serum is a great value for the price. Goes on smooth and leave skin feeling hydrated, not oily, shiny, or tight like some other serums. I use it daily under my moisturizer and it works great!

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was really interested in this brand of products. I do not like the packaging as the pumps do not function properly. I will be purchasing my next round of retinol from a different company.

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily/combo skin depending what time it is during the year so I occasionally get break outs. This has helped a ton to lighten any scarring or pigmentation that I would get. My skin also lookers smoothers & pores a lot smaller. On my 4th bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Works as well as higher priced products.

customer_reviews.text: I must say, I have tried everything. I can not believe this product. IT DOES WORK. I do not even remember how I discovered it. Try for your self. It is so inexpensive what have you got to loose?

customer_reviews.title: It’s showing results!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so far because of my super sensitive facial and neck skin and I am seeing results (slowly) without the symptoms I got from the hundreds of other facial products. So, thank you so far!

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: ... a retinol serum and must say I am in love! I use it day and night and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a retinol serum and must say I am in love! I use it day and night and I haven't had one breakout since I started using it. I feel it keeps my skin clear and gives it a nice healthy glow. Great product will be repurchasing.

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have fine lines and was really pleased with this serum. It does a great job and I noticed a difference within a week of every other day use. Very pleased, and will purchase again.

My skin is very sensitive and it leaves it looking healthy, feeling smoote, and it evens out my skin tone very nicely. I will continue buying this product!

I have noticed no difference whatsoever in the appearance of my skin since I began using it in June. Additionally, the pump on the bottle was poorly made, at first product would shoot all over the place, now the pump has ceased working at all and I have to unscrew the bottle to get serum. Will not buy again.

You are looking a lot younger than the last time I saw you. I am not going to say anything since it's only been two weeks. I also added once a week the vitamin c and hyauronic acid to my regiment.

I had bought some high price facial creme and I was running out and it was okay but I decided to try something elese and I am glad I did, Love this product
customer_reviews.author: JEWELL

customer_reviews.title: Powerfu, Yet Doesn't Sting
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, the soothing ingredients really take the "sting" out of starting a strong retinol. I have tried other (weaker) products, and had problems with flaking and adjusting to the retinol. But, not with Advanced Retinol Serum, which my skin accepted after only two uses. I was initially worried that it was not a true, powerful retinol, but the results (better skin texture, and much more even skin tone) are undeniable. This is a true, powerful retinol and yet, gentle and relatively easy to adjust to. The product is properly packaged to preserve the ingredient's potency and purity. The product showed up promptly with packaging and product pristine. Couldn't be happier :D
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophyle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product and product line!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for nearly a year now, and I will continue to use it! It works as promised! I am 49 with minimal but still perceptible signs of aging. The worst was the dullness, fine lines, and dehydration. My skin started to show improvements well before the first bottle was empty, and continues to make subtle improvements. I love it. I use it conjunction with the toner, hyaluronic acid, eye cream, and night cream.
customer_reviews.author: outlivemylife

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to skin care regimen
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 6 months. It is easy to use and I do think it promotes skin turnover, reducing line and wrinkle depth.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about dark spots but definitely helps wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a retinol serum before, so being a first-timer with this process, I'm happy to have chosen this product. It isn't sticky, it makes my face feel smooth and I feel like I'm actually doing something preventative for my skin. I can't tell if it's actually working though; I lack any serious lines or scars to begin with. I do, however have dark spots that I'm trying to clear up. They're still there after going through a bottle so maybe this isn't best for dark spots? However I still like it and feel like it's helping to keep the wrinkles at bay!
customer_reviews.author: the mezzer

customer_reviews.title: Smooths skin and reduces pores
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to smooth skin and reduce pores. I don't find it lightens spots and freckles for which retinol is often touted. I assume you need RX strength to do that.

customer_reviews.title: Love cosmedica products

I hope as I continue to use this product that I will see more positive results. I am wondering if there is a facial cleanser with glyconic Acid that I could purchase.

product_meta.title: COSMEDICA Retinol Serum 2.5%, 1 Ounce
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM STRENGTH 2.5% RETINOL, the term describes vitamin A derivatives that unclog pores, boost collagen to reduce fine lines, and speed cell turnover to even out discoloration and smooth the skin-sometimes in as little as four weeks.

COMPLETE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE; Made in the USA With The Highest Quality Natural and Organic Ingredients Available: 97% Natural, 72% Organic. Contains No Alcohol, No Parabens, Plant Based, No GMO's, Cruelty Free and Never Tested On Animals.
POTENT Retinol Serum, Cosmedica uses the BEST NATURAL and ORGANIC ingredients - Gives MAXIMUM Anti-Oxidant Protection & helps ELIMINATE fine lines and wrinkles.
